title: Chauncey H. Griffith
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102020617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102020617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Chauncey H. Griffith**

1879-1956

Vice-President of Typographic Development for the [Mergenthaler Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102020617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mergenthaler%20Linotype) Company of New York.

[William Addison Dwiggins](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102020617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/William%20Addison%20Dwiggins) and [Rudolph Ruzicka](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102020617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rudolph%20Ruzicka) worked for him.

_Associated Fonts:_  
 [Ionic](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102020617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ionic) (1925)  
 [Poster Bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102020617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Poster%20Bodoni) (1929)  
 [Excelsior](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102020617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Excelsior) (1931)  
 [Paragon](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102020617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Paragon) (1935)  
 [Opticon](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102020617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Opticon) (1935-6)  
 [Janson](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102020617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Janson) (1937)  
 [Bell Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102020617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bell%20Gothic) (1938)  
 [Corona](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102020617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Corona) (1941)  
 [Monticello](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102020617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monticello) (1946)
author: filip blazek
